lead_paragraph: A tree in New Jersey that is older than America was unable to withstand the stress of the August heat this year, an arborist said.

headline.print_headline: A Tree Older Than Columbus Finally Succumbs

snippet: A tree in New Jersey that is older than America was unable to withstand the stress of the August heat this year, an arborist said....
abstract: Grace Notes column; oak tree estimated to be 600 years old, under which George Washington is said to have lunched with Marquis de Lafayette, is being removed from cemetery of Basking Ridge Presbyterian Church in New Jersey; arborists have determined unseasonably hot August, combined with sustained drought, killed beloved local landmark.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Basking Ridge Presbyterian Church (Basking Ridge, NJ)
